Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I’m currently mapping the product portfolios of several spirits brands including Johnnie Walker, Chivas Regal, Smirnoff, Grey Goose, Absolut Vodka, Bacardi as of June 2025.
The scope covers only their standard product in the Core / Permanent Range excluding any flavor variants or limited-edition/seasonal releases.
Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the columns: Brand, Product, Category, Sub-category, Pack Size (Bottle), ABV %. For any missing information, fill in '/'.
Please ensure that no cells in the “Brand” column are left blank.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?
